article_title: Neighborhood Health Plan of RI relocating to Smithfield in 2016
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox

article_metadata.description: Neighborhood Health Plan of Rhode Island, which in recent years has seen tremendous growth in both the number of its subscribers and the size of its staff, will begin relocating its headquarters from Providence to Smithfield early in 2016, according to a company spokesman.Neighborhood will move 200 employees -- not quite half of its workforce of 435 -- out of offices located on Promenade Street, said Tom Boucher, senior manager of communications and public affairs, They'll move into
article_metadata.author: Richard Salit
